name: Own domain as source of traffic
description: Own domain should not cover more than 5% of traffic in dimension Source. Sometimes it might happen that own domain is listed as a source of traffic. This happens typically during reload at the end of session (e.g. sessions through opened tabs). Session would then have source/medium own domain instead of direct/none and it would overwrite key source of traffic (e.g. paid campaign).

constants.name: sessionShareThreshold
constants.description: maximum share of own domain allowed among sources

blocks.description: Loads data and checks for presence in sessions by hostname
blocks.failMessage: No data returned for sessions by hostname

blocks.description: If there is any session coming from the hostname with the highest number of sessions, the test fails.
blocks.passMessage: Own domain ({hostName}) is not a source of traffic (share of sessions is below {sessionShareThreshold*100} %)
blocks.failMessage: Own domain ({hostName}) is a source of traffic (share of sessions above {sessionShareThreshold*100} %)
blocks.failHowtofix: Own domain should be excluded using „referral exclusion list“ on property level.
